metadata.title: CVE-2014-9792 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: arch/arm/mach-msm/ipc_router.c in the Qualcomm components in Android before2016-07-05 on Nexus 5 devices uses an incorrect integer data type, whichallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka Androidinternal bug 28769399 and Qualcomm internal bug CR550606.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
